# React Academic Portfolio Project

## Project Overview
Academic portfolio website built with React for showcasing professor information, courses, publications, and research.

## Progress Tracking
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [ ] Scaffold React project
- [ ] Create component structure
- [ ] Implement styling
- [ ] Build navigation
- [ ] Complete project

## Tech Stack
- React 18
- React Router for navigation
- CSS for styling
- Vite as build tool
